website_summaries.verdict: One of the best complete mud flap sets for truck owners wanting a custom, perfect fit.
pros: Heavy-duty mud flaps are designed to cover the exact width of the factory tires that come with most modern trucks
Thermoplastic resists deformation in bad weather
cons: Limited amount of compatible vehicles and model years

customer_reviews.title: Fit and work well easy install
customer_reviews.text: Fit well and keep the evils of the road off the truck. Easy to install using all original holes. I actually used factory screws. Would buy another set for another vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Fit my 2017 Ram 1500 but a pain to install
customer_reviews.text: 2017 Ram 1500 Big Horn with full length steps.. Took about 4 hours to install all four but part of that time was spent hunting for the correct drill and a very short drill bit. You have to drill at least one hole in the wheel well plastic liner for each installation. This requires a right angle drill and a short bit. To use a normal drill you have to remove each wheel from the truck. My truck has full length steps. The front mud flaps do touch the steps after installation but they do fit..
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't cover rock-guard being removed
customer_reviews.text: These look and feel nice, but no where was it described that you have to remove your rock guards to get these on until I opened the package and looked at the instructions. By removing the guard you expose some body bolts. I would prefer a mudflap that would cover the same area and not leave ugly bolts showing...so off to find a different set, or go without. (Was going to put these on my 2018 Ram 1500 Sport Night edition)
customer_reviews.author: S. Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Great Product but not the best instructions
customer_reviews.text: Flaps look great on the truck and appear to be very durable. I would definitely recommend them to others but would also recommend reading the instructions thoroughly at least two times. They aren't very clear but if you take your time you shouldn't have any issues with the installation. The first side took a little longer to do while I was learning how to do the install but the second side went quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: They fit my 2016 Ram 2500 very well.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three or four other brands for my 2016 Ram 2500 SLT and none of them fit. This pair fit very well and easy to install. My running boards made it a tight fit in front but I used a couple of rubber spacers under the bottom screw which bumped the bottom forward slightly. For third screw that goes into the wheel liner, I heated a nail with a propane torch and it melted a hole through the mud flap and liner like a hot knife through butter. Added the retaining clip to backside of liner and that third screw tightened down nicely. They seem to be very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: OBoy

customer_reviews.title: Needed modification to fit. Nice flexable plastic
customer_reviews.text: No branding, and looks factory. My 2017 Ram 2500 tradesman didn't come with mud flaps and I needed to be sure my Travel Trailer didn't get rock chips so I purchased the Husky Mud Guards. Be prepared to do some extra drilling. I had to modify mine in order to get a good tight fit. The manufacturer need to address this as this item in not a modification free fitment. Otherwise, with a little extra effort, these work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Luxury Backpacker

customer_reviews.title: Stylish but some quality contol issues.
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are clear. Install required some awkward drilling to secure inside of guard. Poor quality control meant that the paint protecting adhesive tape was not cut correctly so wouldn't peel out for application. Rear mud guards are sitting directly on paint without protection. Disappointing that Husky didn't have measures to avoid poor products leaving the factory.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Fist 2019 Ram 1500 Classic 3.6 v6
customer_reviews.text: Installed in 1.5 hrs. Drilled 1 hole per flap from behind with no problem. Drill holes by reaching under the truck and drill from the back side of the fender well. All of my tires were pointed straight with no problem during install. Does not interfere with my nerf bars. Looks perfect and they are strong in place.
customer_reviews.author: Elon Musk

customer_reviews.title: What might take 20 to 30 minutes on their video might take you 4 hours in reality.
customer_reviews.text: Installation was a bitch. They give lousy pictures of installation and I am usually pretty good at figuring these things out. They give two strips of clear peel away plastic to protect your paint bur a really lousy job of showing how to place them on the fender wells.
customer_reviews.author: William Records

customer_reviews.title: This item was purchased for use on my husband's 2017 ...
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased for use on my husband's 2017 RAM 1500 Big Horn. The assembly was smooth and the mud flaps fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: NF72295

customer_reviews.title: Good value for your money
customer_reviews.text: Easy 15 min install I just put the 2 designed bolts in did not drill the other 2 option bolts so far so good its solid has little bit of flex but nothing crazy so I figured I'd try it out for a while if all else fails I'll pull the tires and drill the holes
customer_reviews.author: Freight hauler

customer_reviews.title: Quality, but go with OEM Mopar for a true fit and QA inspected product.
customer_reviews.text: Flipping terrible. The quality of plastic is very nice... However, it really s Doesn't line up, or fit tight like they would have you believe, and the 3M anti-rub protection film isn't cut as they think it is. No actual QA inspection or fitment I'd say. I'm still going to install them, but for mud/rock guards, I'd recommend OEM Mopar
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: We have Husky floor liners in my truck and my wife's SUV and love them. The mud flaps are also another good product from them. The install was overall very easy except the rears require you to drill an extra screw and the tire makes that challenging. I ended up angling the screw from behind the tire and it worked well. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Misleading ad ,as hey work fine with flairs
customer_reviews.text: Very well made ,heavy duty and put them all on my Ram without having to remove the wheels. My RAM has fender flairs and could not use the original screws. THEY WORK WITH FLAIRS Simply drill new holes and each guard comes with 3 long philips head screws.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis RC

customer_reviews.title: No drilling--see pics!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I posted pics of how I did mine. I didn't want to drill holes into my car so I only connected the stock screws to the guards. Had to remove the little guards that came stock. Those were a hassle to remove. But wanted to display in the pics how they fit. I definitely would recommend them. Just make sure to screw them in literally as tight as they can go.
customer_reviews.author: Big bad Jon

customer_reviews.title: love these splash guards
customer_reviews.text: love these splash guards. they fit will, look great and serve their purpose. I do highly recommend not using the flimsy film protector that is designed to protect the paint. Instead buy 3m double sided tape. This will ensure better paint protection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, easy installation
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 2015 Ram 1500, they fit really good. I had to take the factory molding off of the fenders to get everything to fit properly. It took me around 45 minutes to put these on , I used the factory screws and holes lined up perfectly with the ones on the fender wells. Would recommend these for your vehicle great fit with factory running boards.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Y

customer_reviews.title: Love these mudflaps!
customer_reviews.text: I love these mud flaps! Simple install on 2017 Ram 1500, keep crap from the road from splashing up on the side of the truck. Cheaper then weather tech and hold up great! Use with 303 aerospace protectant spray to keep black plastic from fading in sunlight and looking great!
customer_reviews.author: a+bBlank

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The best accessory I could have bought for my truck (the running boards a very close second). Good fit, good quality. Keeps stones, tar, and other road debris off the doors and back half of the fenders. Also very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon D. Freeland

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product - Fitment is Right on the Mark!
customer_reviews.text: These Mud Guards fit my 2018 Dodge Ram 1500 Quad Cab perfectly! I only have one concern on the rear mud flaps. Since Dodge placed a 1 piece stone guard that runs for 8 inches horizontally beyond the mud flap, there is no protection for the underside of the rear bed panel. If some one has a suggestion for how to protect that area, please advise. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great 👍
customer_reviews.text: The biggest pain was installing the optional screw into the OEM fender liners. But other than that no issues with the install and they fit great
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly, easy to install and looks great. Stops rock chips and stuff on road from hitting truck. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: jason a

customer_reviews.title: Description
customer_reviews.text: First description says it fits my 2019 Ram 1500 Classic. Further down a red rectangle says nope. Which is it?
customer_reviews.author: Douglas K. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you have wheel to wheel step bars!
customer_reviews.text: This is the answer if you need to find something that fits a Ram 2500 that has wheel to wheel step bars. They are rugged and secure and look nice. The main thing is is that they protect the lower side of the truck and the front of my camper. A great choice!
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: Sticks out bad
customer_reviews.text: OMG do they stick out. On a 2500 Ram it looks like you have a set of wings sticking out. Knew they might a little but it's around 3-4". Hideous and returned them.
customer_reviews.author: MD2Aman

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my boyfriends Christmas. He loved them and immediately put on his truck. He is very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: D@OK

customer_reviews.title: Ease of install
customer_reviews.text: I had these on my Ram within 90 minutes of delivery and most of that was waiting for the 3M strips to dry.. Great product easy install love the look!
customer_reviews.author: AQUARIST40

customer_reviews.title: mud flaps
customer_reviews.text: I have installed other brands that were easy, I had a little harder time with these. They look great and seem to be very durable.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Dvorak

customer_reviews.title: If you want great mud flaps, at a super price for your Ram, these are the ones!
customer_reviews.text: These were just what i was looking for on my 2015 Ram. The istall was easy and they fit very well! The no drill install is great as drilling holes just starts a rust spot! Work very well with the factory setps, no mod needed for the install.
customer_reviews.author: MN GQ

customer_reviews.title: Fits and looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 17 Ram just fine. I used different hardware with stainless steel washers and lock nuts for added strength.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Wayne Maybe

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Looks great. Back set can be a little better shaped to hug closer to the body panel but overall almost perfect fit. Drilling required for the best fit. I needed to buy a 90 degree drill adapter to fit behind the wheels to drill.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: These mud flaps look great and went on fairly quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: These mud flaps look great and went on fairly quick and easy. Be sure to keep your fingers clean when handling the clear protectant film so you don't get finger prints in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blocks the rocks
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and work great! No more rocks flying up and chipping our paint.
customer_reviews.author: Leann M

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and a perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: These were a piece of cake to install and a perfect fit on my Gen4 RAM 1500.
customer_reviews.author: American

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Have came loose a few times even though I have followed the instructions exactly. Had to add an additional screw to hold in place better.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Wide
customer_reviews.text: These aren’t wide enough to stop tire shine product from splashing the doors and chrome step on my 2019 Ram 1500 Classic.
customer_reviews.author: FLK9

customer_reviews.title: 2015 Ram 2500
customer_reviews.text: These fit my 2015 Ram 2500 perfectly. I was getting rock chips down the sides of my truck should have put these on sooner! My truck didn't come from the factory with any wheel flares or wheel liners.
customer_reviews.author: Mack

customer_reviews.title: Ok folks here is a rundown. They fit correctly ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok folks here is a rundown. They fit correctly they arrived on time. Installing them is a breeze. In fact if you are not able to install these. Do everyone a favor sell all of your tools immediately.
customer_reviews.author: david ellis

customer_reviews.title: 2018 Ram mud flap.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. Easy installation. I am really impressed with how well they keep road grime of of the truck.
customer_reviews.author: Delayne W.

customer_reviews.title: Trust Husky brand
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, sturdy, very well made. I trust the Husky brand!
customer_reviews.author: D. Vickers

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Went wuth theese on my new 17 Ram 2500HD. Fit great. Really liuke the quality and that they give you the pai t protection strips as well. Quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Paint protection  film
customer_reviews.text: Mudflaps look very nice but the protective paint tape was not good. On the front pair the tape should have been cut to mirror image of right and left but where not same shape. The rear were not die cut through so I had to cut myself and hope to get right shape.
customer_reviews.author: Gary J. Reif

customer_reviews.title: Good flaps, bad paint protectstrips.
customer_reviews.text: Love the mud flaps. Hate the paint protector they send. Can barely see the out line but isn’t even cut out. Had to figure out a work around.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: very durable and fit up very easily
customer_reviews.text: this product was my first for my new truck dodge ram 1500 2018 they fit right in place using factory screws.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Gagnon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly on the model of vehicle we ordered them for. Quality is good
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Do

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and seem to be holding up well as I live on a dirt road.
customer_reviews.author: Kennyjll

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: Have not installed these yet, but have had them on other vehicles and I know the quality and fit are good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2018 Ram 2500
customer_reviews.text: 2018 Ram 2500. Perfect fit. Did not have to remove tires -Yay! Look great
customer_reviews.author: TnT

customer_reviews.title: Good guards
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 14 ram . Recently moved to acreage on gravel . Thought I'd give these a try , no more mud splatter and really cuts down on the rock chips. Very easy to install took maybe 30 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: NOT A TIGHT FIT
customer_reviews.text: did not fit the body line on the fender on a 2014 RAM 3500, great price but if your looking for something like the factory flaps this aint it,
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit looks great
customer_reviews.text: these are super easy to install and look great on my 2010 dodge ram 1500. they came as described and fit just like they were made for my truck..came with everything i needed to install them.
customer_reviews.author: rickie mccarty

customer_reviews.title: I really like the way these fit I even got use the ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way these fit I even got use the original screws in the fenders. They look great and serve a real purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Davis

customer_reviews.title: Save the paint
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, fits my Dodge Ram 1500 perfectly and looks great. Fronts fits even with my step bar. Must have to save your paint from road debris.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Jacks

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on. I wish I didn't have to take off the factory rock guards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rock guard film flawed
customer_reviews.text: The guards fit just fine, however the clear rock guard film that was sent with them was not perforated so as to be able to be pulled off or applied. Had to discard it as unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Juspassin

customer_reviews.title: Great for a gift!
customer_reviews.text: These look good and were really easy to install. I bought them for a gift and they were a hit. He really likes them, their look & their function.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Masters

customer_reviews.title: As promised, great set of mud flaps.
customer_reviews.text: Put these on a 16 RAM 1500. Very easy install, quality product, would highly recommend if you need a set for your RAM
customer_reviews.author: clay282

customer_reviews.title: N/A
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great but the paint protective tape was not cut as described. Had to cut it myself. Not happy since I was not able to cut as precisely as it should have been. Problem with Husky quality control on this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and keeps my truck protected
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to my 2017 Ram blackout. Reused screws from rock guards. Fit perfect. No drill needed!
customer_reviews.author: robbankston

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit easy to install. No more scratches on my truck
customer_reviews.author: Bou

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: these fit my 2015 ram 1500 sport perfectly and look great
customer_reviews.author: Davus 1889

customer_reviews.title: Great molded fit.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit but to complete install on inner fastners you need to remove rear wheels or have a drill at a 90° angle to run in the screw. Otherwise, very easy to install. No complications to install on front wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: These mud flaps look great and were easy to install. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Redinger

customer_reviews.title: Husky Liners Front & Rear Mud Guards
customer_reviews.text: These fit my 2018 RAM 1500 with wheel to wheel running boards with no problems. Great look on the truck and I love them. Excellent product, I would recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit on 2019 Ram 1500 Classic
customer_reviews.text: This product fits like a glove and is very easy to install with simple hand tools. Service was very fast and arrived well in advance of the projected delivery date.

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and good protection for my truck
customer_reviews.text: They look nice on My Ram and they will protect it from stone chips . great buy👍

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Installed in minutes, all parts were in the carton. great product

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Installed quick and easy great at this into my truck

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on my Ram 1500 SLT Crew Cab with factory runnbig boards. No modifications needed.

customer_reviews.title: easy fast install
customer_reviews.text: easy install looks great on truck used factory bolts to install and yes no drilling!!

customer_reviews.title: 15 minutes to install!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, used existing screws and holes. Instead of any additional drilling, I used 3M VHB, double stick tape up against the wheel well liners. Great product!

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and look/work perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Look and work just as I'd hoped. Easy to install even with side steps already on my truck.

customer_reviews.title: What can I say they are mudflaps
customer_reviews.text: They are mudflaps! Looks good and fit perfect. Didn’t have to use any included hardware.

customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Just what I expected and very satisfied with the product.

customer_reviews.text: I think there’s no difference in quality between this and the far more expensive OEM option

customer_reviews.title: These are much better. Fits perfect

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Took me about 15 minutes to install all 4. Couldn’t even finish a beer before they were all installed. Look great.

customer_reviews.title: Remove tires and add the Extra fastener  you'll thank me later
customer_reviews.text: All 5 stars from me fit was nice used on 2017 ram express

customer_reviews.title: just used the old rock guard screws that came with the truck and that seemed to hold them pretty well.
customer_reviews.text: Came with a bunch of extra screws and hardware, just used the old rock guard screws that came with the truck and that seemed to hold them pretty well.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking AND functional.
customer_reviews.text: Love these things. Easy to install and look great on the truck. Do a great job protecting the paint on the truck as well.

customer_reviews.title: Installation does require drilling a hole through the fender liner ...
customer_reviews.text: Installation does require drilling a hole through the fender liner unless you want to risk just running the stock hardware. If you're patient you can do this without pulling off the wheels.

customer_reviews.title: A perfect fit, very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: A perfect fit, very easy to install, seem to be very sturdy, I live in MN and no problems with the snow build up

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit with Crew Cab full wheel to wheel side steps ! Fairly easy to install. Found it easier to drill from the backside for the rear flaps rather than take the tires off.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money

product_meta.title: Husky Liners Fits 2009-18 Dodge Ram 1500, 2019 Dodge Ram 1500 Classic, 2010-18 Dodge Ram 2500/3500 - without OEM Fender Flares - SINGLE REAR WHEELS Custom Front and Rear Mud Guard Set
product_meta.description: Size:Custom Front and Rear Mud Guard Set| Style:Without OEM Fender FlaresFront and Rear Mud Guard Set
feature_bullets: Mud Guards fit WITHOUT OEM Fender Flares
Our Mud Guards are tailor fit to match your fenders perfectly
Our Mud Guards are built to the maximum width for full tread coverage of factory tires
Durable, impact resistant all-weather thermoplastic material
Designed and manufactured in the USA
